name: Insiders
storyline:
STORY
You and your ship have been shrunk and injected into the human body. There is a cure for cancer inside, but it’s not working as it should. You need to find out what’s wrong and fix it. The patient is dying quickly, and you are the last hope of humanity to eradicate this horrible disease once and for all.

GAMEPLAY
Your ship needs fuel and air to keep the systems running. You can harvest resources from dead microbes or mine minerals from the blood. You can craft weapons, mining lasers, shields, engines and other ships components. You can also upgrade your ship software to increase speed and energy

FIGHTING
Your ship can use its shields to block the enemy attacks or use evasive maneuvers to escape. You have cannons and ray weapons available to fight. Laser mining tools enables you to split and collect minerals. In time you will learn to craft even more advanced weapons to fight stronger enemies and with improved mining lasers you will collect resources faster.

LOOTS
You can find crashed ships from the previous missions inside of the human body. Those wrecks could contain resources, special items, enhanced weapons and ship upgrades.

BUILDING
Building system is like a building kit. You can craft and build bases to store your resources, to repair your ship and to instantly teleport among bases. You can also build automated factories to manufacture advance items and weapons.
summary: Welcome to the dangerous micro world hidden inside the human body. Pilot a ship through the bloodstream. Mine resources, fight microbes, craft items and weapons. Build bases. Follow quests and find a cure for cancer. Don’t get eaten!
